title: When you get placed in Bronze after placements.
body:
You may subliminally hear something like this. (I know I do)

https://youtu.be/kuGHonrmJmA

replies.body:
Lucker, now you don't have to deal with the toxic silver elohell experience of climbing against your new, unranked less than 10 games in ranked rookies with duo smurfs helping out their silver pals reach gold as your entire team and theirs will flame&report you into oblivion if you die once, take 1 cs, afk for saying 1 ?/ks,off meta builds that never work with awful runes and masteries, support cleanse ghost teemos that sit in the bush and say they are just a ward whole game brb.
Welp at least bronze is a heart of gold> than most league players, even if they do trash talk, it's just banter down there, and less toxic than ever while still having fun in ranked.

> [{quoted}](name=Peritheus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ELgH2lca,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-27T09:30:52.435+0000)
>
> Lucker, now you don't have to deal with the toxic silver elohell experience of climbing against your new, unranked less than 10 games in ranked rookies with duo smurfs helping out their silver pals reach gold as your entire team and theirs will flame&report you into oblivion if you die once, take 1 cs, afk for saying 1 ?/ks,off meta builds that never work with awful runes and masteries, support cleanse ghost teemos that sit in the bush and say they are just a ward whole game brb.
> Welp at least bronze is a heart of gold> than most league players, even if they do trash talk, it's just banter down there, and less toxic than ever while still having fun in ranked.

Not my experience, everyone acted like they wanted to murder each other IRL
